servicesData.title: Roof Inspections
servicesData.descriptionTitle: Roof Inspection, Existing Conditions, and Surveys and Evaluations
servicesData.shortDescription: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat.
servicesData.description:
BC Roof Inspections’ detailed reports contain valuable and pertinent information regarding the buildings’ existing roof system and components. They are used for assessing a new purchase or refinancing of existing commercial and industrial buildings. Our reports are also used for General Assessments for building owners at budget time. 
BC Roof Inspections’ reports are used by property management companies, real estate development firms, retirement funds, restaurants, hospitals, school districts, city, county, and provincial and federal agencies just to name a few. 
The data that is compiled during our field inspections are presented in an organized way (see Roof Management Page) which explains each roof item in detail. The information in the roof inspection report includes the existing condition(s) of the roof and components, estimated remaining life of the existing roof(s) and provides budget numbers for corrective action (ongoing maintenance, repairs and replacement estimates). Our reports also include photo documentation. 
We also specialize in deck membrane inspections and sundeck, parkade and courtyard waterproofing inspections.
